name: Mana Match (Alpha)
description:
Mana Match is very early in development and most of the art is placeholder, this project will be continuously updated and may change significantly. Use the itch.io client so it automatically updates!

Note on Web version: For now, the web player is a bit finnick, specially if your connection has a bit of latency, you may need to reload the page if it doesn't load properly. The download size is around 7MB total for the WASM version.

If you are on a mobile, use your phone on landscape, you may need to unlock 🔓 your phone portrait orientation through it's menu.

Playing on the desktop should not have problems. Linux version for now is not compatible with multi monitor setup - this will be fixed in a future version.

When I was a kid I played a lot of Tetris Attack and later  I played Pieces (SNES). When I was bit older I went to a friend's house to play Heroes of Might and Magic Clash of Heroes on his Xbox360. This game will be a side project that I will slowly evolve towards a mix of these ideas. I am making it public so it's a bit easier for my close friends to try it, but feel free to play too. There's very little game at this point, so be aware.

Music: Adventure by SubspaceAudio

Background: stealthix
